head.title: Jaco's Financial Results Set Record for Quarter

hedline.hl1: Jaco's Financial Results Set Record for Quarter

abstract.p: Jaco Electronics Inc of Hauppauge, NY, reports record quarterly net sales of $70.5 million and record quarterly net income of $3.5 million as well as record year-end net income of $6,376,000; logo (S)

block.p: Jaco Electronics Inc. of Hauppauge, a distributor of electronic components (Nasdaq: JACO), reported record fourth-quarter results and a revenue increase of 48.8 percent for the year. The quarterly results represent company records for net sales, net income and earnings per share.

Net sales for the quarter were $70.5 million, almost double the $36.3 million during the year-ago quarter. Net income for the quarter was $3.5 million, or 58 cents a share, compared to last year's net loss of $919,000, or 17 cents a share.

Jaco Electronics Inc. of Hauppauge, a distributor of electronic components (Nasdaq: JACO), reported record fourth-quarter results and a revenue increase of 48.8 percent for the year. The quarterly results represent company records for net sales, net income and earnings per share.

Net sales for the quarter were $70.5 million, almost double the $36.3 million during the year-ago quarter. Net income for the quarter was $3.5 million, or 58 cents a share, compared to last year's net loss of $919,000, or 17 cents a share.

Net sales for the year ended June 30 were $209.3 million, up from $140.7 million a year earlier. Net income was $6,376,000, or $1.11 a share, compared with a net loss of $1.2 million, or 21 cents a share.
The company attributed the strong results mainly to the general economy.
